entry.title: $2700 // NO FEE - GREAT VALUE 1-BRs - BRAND NEW LIC BLDG - CLOSE TO TRAINS!
entry.content:
SOME OF THE BEST-VALUE ONE BEDROOMS IN LONG ISLAND CITY!!

NO BROKER FEE
BRAND NEW BUILDING
$2,700 - $2,900/MONTH

Apartment Features:

High ceilings (9' - 12')
Exposed Brick
Brushed Oak Flooring
Designer Kitchens with Ceasarstone Countertops
Stainless Steel Kitchen Appliances
Washer and Dryer in every apartment

Building Features/Amenities:

Virtual Doorman
Three Rooftop Terraces
Fully-Equipped Fitness Center featuring PELETON
Outdoor Playground/Picnic area
Tenant Lounge and Media Room
Vintage Arcade Room
Billiards Table
Business Center
Bike Storage
Building Storage
Garage Parking

Building is immediately adjacent to 36th Street subway stop (M and R trains). Also very close to 39th Ave stop (N and W trains).
Easy access to midtown Manhattan.

*** Please reply/text/call Mark at show contact info for more info or to schedule a viewing. Flexible viewing times available ***
